node.statement: Lasso composition eq 2.19: L_{1<-tau}^{tau tau} x L_{tau<-1}^{tau tau} = (1+xi^2)/xi^{3/2} P_1^{(2)}. Apply the general tube algebra formula with i=1, s=tau, i'=1, j=j'=k=k'=tau. The result is proportional to P_1^{(2)} because P_1^{(2)} projects onto the eigenspace where tau acts with eigenvalue -1/xi.
